message.body: I'm going to be in NYC at noon tomorrow until Friday sometime to go to the cloisters. Let me know if you have time to hang out :)
I could do lunch tomorrow if you wanted to come by studio or I could go to cloisters in Friday probably depending on time
I'm meeting my gallerist and don't have a schedule in place with him. I'll contact you when I'm there and see if our schedules sinc up.
Hopefully I can meet you for lunch and the cloisters on fri morning but I have to see what my gallerist's plans are.
I made arrangements to go straight to your studio so we could get lunch then I have to meet up with ##################### at 2. Will that work for you?
Yes. I get out of class at 12 so that is perfect. Studio is ##########
We will be going to the cloisters Friday am, but probably not too early as we will likely be out carousing thurs night. You are welcome to come. Daniel will have his car if that helps.
I'll head to your studio when I get in then. I can't wait to see it :)
Might have to pass on cloisters but excited to hang tomorrow
